synopsis.text: Looks like Yuu Haruna's life is about to take an unexpected turn! After moving to Tokyo to live with his sisters, the introverted Yuu finds solace in his smartphone and Twitter. But when he collides with the enigmatic Fuuka Akitsuki, a girl who doesn't even own a cell phone, his world is flipped upside down. Fuuka's free-spirited nature captivates Yuu, and he finds himself drawn to her. Meanwhile, Yuu's childhood friend Koyuki Hinashi, now a famous singer, reconnects with him via Twitter. As the three of them cross paths, a complicated love triangle unfolds, intertwined with the power of music. Will Yuu find love through technology or through real-life connections? Only time will tell in this captivating tale of love, music, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
